revised_title: Mass Extinctions Among Tetrapods and the Quality of the Fossil Record
tldr: This article discusses the evolution and extinction of tetrapods, focusing on the quality and incompleteness of the fossil record. It examines the factors affecting preservation and the challenges in assessing the fossil record's completeness. The study highlights the importance of understanding the incompleteness of the fossil record to improve macroevolutionary studies and test hypotheses related to mass extinctions.
